entry.title: White Liquid Sculpey 1 oz. , ALS3523 (new)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polyform
Type: Polymer Clay
Price: 2.39

White Liquid Sculpey 1 Ounce ,  ALS3523

Liquid Polymer Clay.  Create free-form designs, fill oven-safe molds or use to embellish clay.

  • Works perfectly with Sculpey Silicone Bakeable Molds
  • Great for detailing miniature pieces and for “drawing” with clay
  • Perfect for using with molds and building by baking and re-baking layers
  • Great for all types of clay projects–Grout for tiles, painting designs on clay, fill carving pieces and much more!
  • Available in 1 fl oz (30mL)

entry.title: Sculpey Geo Butterfly Silicone Bakeable Mold #APM47
entry.summary:
Vendor: SculpeyProducts.com
Type: Tools & Accessories
Price: 6.00

Sculpey Silicone Bakeable Mold – Geo Butterfly #APM47

Have your craft projects take flight with this beautifully designed butterfly silicone mold. These on trend designs include: fanciful butterflies with polka dots, geometric butterflies and a more realistic looking butterfly for maximum creativity in your projects!   Two sizes of each style butterfly included – perfect for jewelry, paper crafting, home décor and more!

This mold was designed to work perfectly with our Liquid bakeable medium and comes with a squeegee to make an evenly filled mold easier than ever! Simply fill the mold cavities with the liquid bakeable medium, squeegee off excess and bake!  This versatile oven safe silicone mold is compatible with clays, liquid bakeable medium, resin, craft soap and other materials.

Sculpey Silicone Bakeable Mold – Mandala #APM49

This beautifully designed mold contains various sizes and styles of Mandalas for maximum creativity in your projects!  These mandalas are perfect for jewelry, paper crafting, home décor and more!  Layer the different sizes, add gems to the designs for some sparkle and more!

This mold was designed to work perfectly with our Liquid bakeable medium and comes with a squeegee to make an evenly filled mold easier than ever! Simply fill the mold cavities with the liquid bakeable medium, squeegee off excess and bake!  This versatile oven safe silicone mold is compatible with clays, liquid bakeable medium, resin, craft soap and other materials.

entry.title: Liquid Bakeable Medium – Basics # ALSTNT1
entry.summary:
Vendor: Creative Wholesale
Type: liquid Bakeable Medium
Price: 6.59

Liquid Bakeable Medium – Basics  ALSTNT1

Three 1 oz. bottles – Clear, White and Black

Sculpey Liquid Bakeable Medium is a versatile product that can be used in bakeable silicone molds, to embellish clay, used as a grout, for window clings and more! After baking, Liquid Sculpey Bakeable Medium becomes a strong and unique crafting medium that can be used for Home Décor, Jewelry, Scrapbooking and beyond with endless possibilities.  This multi-pack allows you to try three colors!  Each 1 oz. bottle comes with a twist cap for precise flow control – open completely to fill molds.  Open half way for writing and other detail work.

  • Three 1 oz. bottles – Clear, White and Black
  • Clear – The clearest liquid polymer available! Can be used as a coating to achieve a resin-like glazed finish.  Add inclusions for a unique look - glitter, spices, flowers and more! 
  • White – Perfectly opaque – great for image transfers.  Takes color beautifully when tinted     with alcohol based inks or artists chalks.
  • Black – Deep solid ebony color without transparency, perfect for crisp details in window clings and as a grout. Perfect for marbling with other colors for a unique look
  • Perfect for use with oven-safe silicone molds
  • Great for paper crafting, image transfers, jewelry, window clings, grout and more!
  • Excellent leveling properties which allow it to be baked in sheets and poured into jewelry findings.

entry.title: Liquid Bakeable Medium – Metallics #ALSMET1
entry.summary:
Vendor: Creative Wholesale
Type: liquid Bakeable Medium
Price: 6.59

Liquid Bakeable Medium – Metallics

Three 1 oz. bottles – Silver, Gold and Pearl

Sculpey Liquid Bakeable Medium is a versatile product that can be used in bakeable silicone molds, to embellish clay, used as a grout, for window clings and more! Our gold, silver and pearl liquids shimmer with mica pigments that will provide beautiful results in any project! After baking, Liquid Sculpey Bakeable Medium becomes a strong and unique crafting medium that can be used for Home Décor, Jewelry, Scrapbooking and beyond with endless possibilities.  This multi-pack allows you to try three colors!  Each 1 oz. bottle comes with a twist cap for precise flow control – open completely to fill molds.  Open half way for writing and other detail work.

  • Three 1 oz. bottles – Silver, Gold and Pearl
  • Pearl- Can be used as shimmer glaze. Takes color beautifully when tinted with alcohol based inks or artists chalks – perfect for painting on clay
  • Silver -High mica content providing a fabulous metallic sheen. Add a little color to make graphite     and other variations of silver
  • Gold - High mica content providing a fabulous metallic sheen. Perfect to add a touch of shimmer to any project
  • Perfect for use with oven-safe silicone molds
  • Great for paper crafting, image transfers, jewelry, window clings, grout and more!
  • Excellent leveling properties which allow it to be baked in sheets and poured into jewelry findings.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Polyform
Type: Polymer Clay

Sculpey Liquid Bakeable Clay 2 oz. - Clear ALSCL02
  • New Clear is TRULY transparent
  • Allows perfect visibility of additives such as glitter, dried flowers and leaves
  • Can be used as a coating to achieve a resin-like finish within 20 minutes
  • Works perfectly with Sculpey Silicone Bakeable Molds

  • Note: Clear Liquid Bakeable Clay will yellow with repeated baking
  • Available in 2 fl oz (59mL)

entry.title: Liquid Sculpey Translucent, 2 oz. ALSB02
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polyform
Type: Polymer Clay
Price: 5.17

Translucent Liquid Sculpey  2oz. - ALSB02

Translucent Liquid Sculpey is a bakeable liquid polymer medium. That means that it shares many of the same properties as solid polymer clay but has a number of characteristics that offer unique and unexpected possibilities. TLS opens a whole new arena for artists and crafters alike! It is a “bake-able” transfer medium for the new millennium! When artist’s oil paints are mixed with it, it can be an enamel, a glaze, or a backfilling compound. When pigments or mica powders are mixed with it, it can be a stipple, a metallic glaze, or a grout for polymer clay mosaics. TLS is also a fantastic transfer medium. It is a terrific adhesive agent. Its adhesive qualities are activated only after baking. It increases the clay to clay bond between raw layers of clay, and when adding raw layers to previously baked layers. Translucent Liquid Sculpey is available in a 2 oz bottle.
